content:
r>`d.AIRPORT_C_IS_DEP`,
`l.FN_NUMBER`, `l.FN_CARRIER`,
`l.DAY_OF_ORIGIN`, `l.FN_SUFFIX`,
`l.DEP_AP_SCHED`, `l.LEG_STATE`,
`l.LEG_NO`|when `d.FLIGHT_NO` = `l.FN_NUMBER` and `d.AIRLINE` = `l.FN_CARRIER` and
`d.DAY_OF_ORIGIN` = `l.DAY_OF_ORIGIN` and `d.SUFFIX` = `l.FN_SUFFIX` and
`d.AIRPORT_C_IS_DEP` = `l.DEP_AP_SCHED` and `l.LEG_STATE` is not (“CNL“ and “DEL“)
then `l.LEG_NO`| |flightId| | |N/A in the source system.| |crewId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`TLC`| | |udor|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`DAY_OF_ORIGIN`| | |carrier|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`AIRLINE`| | |flightNumber|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`FLIGHT_NO`| | |suffix|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`SUFFIX`| | |departureAirport|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`AIRPORT_C_IS_DEP`| | |arrivalAirport|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`AIRPORT_C_IS_DEST`| | |departureDate|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD`, `DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`|`DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD` + `DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`| |arrivalDate|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD`, `ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`|`ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD` + `ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`| |type| | |N/A in the source system.| |status|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|**Tracking Duty:** `DMLTYPE$$`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `DMLTYPE$$`, `OLD_NEW$$`|**Tracking Duty:** when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“
then “CANCELLED“ else “ACTIVE“
**Tracking Duty Item:** when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“ or
(`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “U“ and `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.OLD_NEW$$` = “U“)
then “CANCELLED“ else “ACTIVE“
| # Crew Ground Transport Data Model ### Data Retrieval
